channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-19360] Disable releases for apache.snapshots repo
item.description:
https://github.com/apache/hadoop/blob/aa5fe6f550c8971762c02c292240a7529001e1d8/pom.xml#L54-L59
  <repositories>
    <repository>
      <id>${distMgmtSnapshotsId}</id>
      <name>${distMgmtSnapshotsName}</name>
      <url>${distMgmtSnapshotsUrl}</url>
    </repository>

The Apache snapshot repository should be enabled only for snapshots.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
adoroszlai opened a new pull request, #7218:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7218

    1. What changes were proposed in this pull request?

The Apache snapshot repository should be enabled only for snapshots.

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HADOOP-19360

    1. How was this patch tested?

local build
